lines.text: There are no midgets in the United States Air Force.
You try one more goddamned stunt and I'll light up the fucking sky!
Gentlemen, we are now a superpower.
Just wanted you to know General, win or lose, you're some motherfucker.
You asshole! Dell's bluffing, huh? He doesn't have the keys, huh? He can't launch, huh? Well take a look MacKenzie and tell me those aren't fucking missiles!
Grow up General. Nobody honors nothin', but that's no reason to blow up the whole world.
They are no midgets in the US Air Force.
